statements: DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND time_stamp = '2022-05-15 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE location_id = 1 AND time_stamp = '2022-09-15 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE vehicle_count >= 100 AND avg_speed <= 60.5;
DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE flow_id = 100 AND signal_id = 5;
DELETE FROM traffic_flow_data WHERE traffic_volume > 100 AND vehicle_speed < 50;
DELETE FROM traffic_signals WHERE status = 'malfunctioning' AND location = 'Main Street';
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = true;
DELETE FROM traffic_cameras WHERE location = 'Main Street' AND camera_type = 'Speed Camera';
